org.smu.wordsimilarity
Class WordSimDBFacade

java.lang.Object
  org.smu.wordsimilarity.WordSimDBFacade

public class WordSimDBFacade
extends java.lang.Object

WordSimDBFacade, implementing several basic functionalies of using a word similarity database.

Constructor Summary
WordSimDBFacade(java.lang.String dataFile)
          Creates a WordSimDBFacade from a SQLite database file, which stores word similarity information.

          Returns all words whose similarity with an input word is equal or greater than a minimum similarity threshold.

          Returns the Top-N most similar words to an input word.

 java.lang.String stemWord(java.lang.String word)

Method Detail

stemWord

public java.lang.String stemWord(java.lang.String word)
Transforms a word into its root form, this function relies on Porter stemmer in Java.

Parameters:
word - The original word
Returns:
The word after stemming.

isInDatabase

public java.lang.Boolean isInDatabase(java.lang.String word)
Checks whether a word exists in the word similarity database.

Parameters:
word - The word to be checked
Returns:
true if and only if the input word exists in the database; false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception happens during database manipulation.

computeSimilarity

public double computeSimilarity(java.lang.String word1,
                                java.lang.String word2)
Returns the similarity between two given words.

Parameters:
word1 - One of the given words
word2 - One of the given words
Returns:
A similarity for the given two words. It returns 1 if word1 and word2 are the same. It returns -1 if anyone of the two given words does not exist in the word similarity database.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception happens during database manipulation.

findMostSimilarWord

public java.lang.String findMostSimilarWord(java.lang.String word)
Returns the most similar word for an input word.

Parameters:
word - The input word
Returns:
The most similar word of the input word. It returns null if the input word does not exist in the database.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception happens during database manipulation.

findMostSimilarWords

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> findMostSimilarWords(java.lang.String word,
                                                             double minSim)
Returns all words whose similarity with an input word is equal or greater than a minimum similarity threshold.

Parameters:
word - The input word
minSim - The minimum similarity threshold
Returns:
A list of words whose similarity with an input word is equal or grater than the given minimum similarity threshold. It returns null if the input word does not exist in the database.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception happens during database manipulation.

findTopNWords

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> findTopNWords(java.lang.String word,
                                                      java.lang.Integer n)
Returns the Top-N most similar words to an input word.

Parameters:
word - The input word
n - The number of returned words
Returns:
A list of n words which are most similar with the input word. It returns null if the input word does not exist in the database.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception happens during database manipulation.

getAllWords

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllWords()
Returns all words that appear in the database.

Returns:
All words exist in the database.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception happens during database manipulation.
